query:
SELECT 
  'Teachers with Avatars' as feature,
  COUNT(*) as available_count
FROM teachers
WHERE avatarUrl IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Teachers with Biographies',
  COUNT(*)
FROM teacher_biographies
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Teachers with Integration Guides',
  COUNT(*)
FROM integration_guides
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Teachers with Key Ideas',
  COUNT(DISTINCT teacherId)
FROM keyIdeas
WHERE teacherId IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Teachers with Practices',
  COUNT(DISTINCT teacherId)
FROM practices
WHERE teacherId IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Teachers with Quotes',
  COUNT(DISTINCT teacherId)
FROM quotes
WHERE teacherId IS NOT NULL;
